component.text:
Upon completion of this chapter you will be able to:

  • Explain the IOS image naming conventions implemented by Cisco.
  • Manage Cisco IOS system image files to support network requirements in small- to medium-sized business networks.
  • Explain the licensing process for Cisco IOS software in a small- to medium-sized business network.
  • Configure a router to install a Cisco IOS software image license.
